Feature Store API

class mlops_client.feature_store.featuretable_client.FeatureTable(headers: Dict[str, str], host: str, client: Optional[aiohttp.client.ClientSession] = None)
async create_mapping(datasource_id: str, source_table_id: str, feature_table_name: str, keys: List[mlops_client.feature_store.feature_key.FeatureKey], features: List[mlops_client.feature_store.feature.Feature]) → Any

Creates a feature table mapping for a given datasource and source table.

Parameters:

  • datasource_id (str): The datasource id.

  • source_table_id (str): The source table id.

  • feature_table_name (str): The feature table name.

  • keys (List[FeatureKey]): A list of FeatureKey objects.

  • features (List[Feature]): A list of Feature objects.

Returns:

Any: The response from the API.
